name: Laser Tag
description:
Laser Tag is an online multiplayer game and has no single player features. Make sure you have someone to play with before playing this game. The objective of the game is to get as many eliminations as possible in the given time frame. There are 3 abilities at the player's disposal, which are: Shoot, Shield, and Blink. This game was originally design for phones but does have mouse and keyboard support.

Computer controls: Left click - move and confirm ability location, Q - get shot ready, W - shield, E - get blink ready.
